lead_paragraph: A bill that would make Hawaii the first state to raise the smoking age to 21 from 18 cleared the Legislature on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Hawaii: State Moves to Set Highest Legal Smoking Age
headline.main: Hawaii: State Moves to Set Highest Legal Smoking Age

snippet: A bill that would make Hawaii the first state to raise the smoking age to 21 from 18 cleared the Legislature on Friday.
abstract: Hawaii Legislature approves bill that would make it first state to raise legal smoking age to 21 from 18; measure now goes to Gov David Ige, with whom its fate is unclear.
